entity.title: Product Store settings for eBay preferences

field.name: smartRelist
field.description: Set to Y to automatically smart relist eBay Listing

field.name: sendXDaysShipped
field.description: Set to Y to automatically send message via eBay for X days shipped orders

field.name: autoImportEbayApi
field.description: Set to Y to use eBay API for order importation. Schedule will be set in JobSandbox entity

field.name: importUpdateShipmentStatus
field.description: Set to Y to automatically update shipment status on eBay right after importation via API

field.name: packUpdateShipmentStatus
field.description: Set to Y to automatically update shipment status on eBay right after completing order shipment (override by importUpdateShipmentStatus)

field.name: daysUpdateEpacket
field.description: X days to update ePacket tracking number

field.name: askFeedback
field.description: Set to Y to use eBay API to send message via eBay API to ask for feedback

field.name: daysAskFeedback
field.description: After X days to send email reminder asking for feedback

field.name: askFeedbackMaxAttempt
field.description: Maximum attempt to send message asking for feedback (lowest 1)

field.name: sendOutOfStockEmail
field.description: Set to Y to automatically send OSA email

field.name: daysSendOutOfStockEmail
field.description: X days after importation to automatically send OSA email

field.name: earlyEpacketTrackNum
field.description: Set to Y to send non-shipped ePacket tracking number to eBay

field.name: autoPullEbayActiveListing
field.description: Set to Y to auto pull eBay Active listing quantity

field.name: autoUpdateEbayQuantity
field.description: Set to Y to auto update listing quantity on eBay

field.name: defaultEbayMinQty
field.description: Default Listing minimum quantity to trigger auto adjust quantity

field.name: defaultEbayListQty
field.description: Default Listing quantity to be set on eBay active listing

entity.title: Product Store settings for eBay preferences
Product setting for each eBay store

field.name: minQuantity
field.description: Minimum Quantity on eBay to trigger auto adjust quantity

entity.title: Active Listings on eBay based on eBay Trading API GetSellerList call

field.name: activeListingId
field.description: Auto ID for eBay Active Listing

field.name: listDetBestAutoAccept
field.description: Listing Details Best Offer Auto Accept Price

field.name: listDetMinBestOfferPrice
field.description: Listing Details Minimum Best Offer Price

field.name: listDetOriginalItemId
field.description: Listing Details TCR Original Item ID

field.name: listDetViewItemUrlNatural
field.description: Listing Details View Item URL for Natural Search

field.name: returnsCostPaidBy
field.description: Returns Policy Shipping Cost Paid By

field.name: returnsCostPaidByOpt
field.description: Returns Policy Shipping Cost Paid By Option

field.name: sellStatBidIncrCurId
field.description: Selling Status Bid Increment Currency ID

field.name: sellStatCurrentPriceCurId
field.description: Selling Status Current Price Currency ID

field.name: sellStatMinToBidCurId
field.description: Selling Status Minimum To Bid Currency ID

field.name: promoOriginalPriceCurId
field.description: Selling Status Promotional Original Price Currency Id

field.name: shipDetExclShipToLoc
field.description: Shipping Details Seller Exclude Ship To Locations Preference
